ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Numbers on Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ken, gott a ask. Do you find going to an overhead view helps targeting in that situation ? I love Mez and consider it much more effective than Charm
ygData.messageBody:
> PS - I love the fix they did to mez. I had a four person group in Seb tonight that handled 7 frogs (five
> initial, two adds) with no Enchanter and no Cleric. Mez seems to last a little longer than the normal
> song, I can sing a full five during a twist, which lets me control 3-4 things with 1-2 resists. (Lag
> depending.)

Ken, gott'a ask. Do you find going to an overhead view helps targeting
in that situation ? I love Mez and consider it much more effective than
Charm because of it's ability to take more than 2 crits out of the
action and in addition, after hitting 51 Moonflower is finding REALLY
limited song space. She can only have space for one crowd control and
Mez is it.
